mainText:
Dear Steve,

You are no longer with us but your time here on Earth was incredibly memorable.  I just wanted to thank you personally for not only the great products you have provided but showing the incredible spirit that you possessed.  I would have loved to have met you but never got the opportunity.  I am a college student and I try to model myself after that great spirit that you displayed.  It has showed me to shoot for the stars and never settle.  I plan to attain my PhD eventually and will remember your words forever.  My condolences to your family. May God be with you.
author: Jacob
